domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
Has anyone else noticed how the government’s Daily Briefings on Covid-19 have changed over time? Fewer scientists, distorted statistics and inconvenient charts removed. This really is not the way to build public confidence and trust.

https://t.co/aTY8coqgN4
